description: Try our easy to follow Mexican Beef Wraps With Lime Yoghurt & Bean Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Taco,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,Beef,Mince,Quick & easy lunch,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Mexican Beef Wraps With Lime Yoghurt & Bean Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Drain and rinse the bean mix, then place in a medium bowl. Add juice from the half lime, chopped coriander and onion.

Heat a non-stick frying pan over medium heat and cook the mince in batches until browned. Return all the mince to pan and add the sliced capsicum and half the cumin. Stir through and ensure the meat is cooked through.
For the lime yoghurt, mix the yoghurt, remaining cumin, 1 tsp of lime juice and black pepper.
Assemble 2 whole grain wraps per person filled with lettuce, tomato, mince and lime yoghurt. Serve with the bean salad and lime wedges.
